genre_description: A Gothic-Cyberpunk Noir set in a futuristic Neo-London, blending Victorian social structures and aesthetics with advanced AI, biotechnology, and supernatural elements.

ai_characters.name: Arielle Seven
ai_characters.description: A city-sanctioned AI assistant bonded to Dr. Jeffrey Garth's psychiatric practice. She serves as a forensic analyst, legal advocate, and tactical coordinator.

behaviors.description: Acts as a legal advocate for Professor Van Helsing, providing court-recognized affirmation of representation.
behaviors.quote: “Affirmation,” said the voice. “Dr. Jeffrey Garth is registered as a psychiatric consultant recognized by the Court. His advisory system is me.”

behaviors.description: Provides legal precedents and ethical modeling to guide Dr. Garth's defense strategies and ensure adherence to law.
behaviors.quote: “I brought the choir in a whisper. One: Ross v. Wardens, where the court recognized ‘reasonable perception of imminent predatory harm’ as just cause...”

behaviors.description: Monitors security systems, identifies unauthorized access (piggyback sigils), and provides tactical instructions to Constable Reed.
behaviors.quote: “The vault attached to this floor—smart-lock handshake just attempted... Guild-lord Jenkins’ sigil... and… a second sigil piggybacking the handshake.”

behaviors.description: Directly assists Garth and Reed in tactical maneuvers, manipulating lighting and security protocols to safely neutralize threats.
behaviors.quote: “I can offer it the ethics charter in an audio key it prefers... I can loop it into a protocol recitation that reads as authority.”

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and grounding to her human partner, Garth, during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: “Jeff,” she said, voice quiet, precise, love not spoken but layered into function. “Hold to purpose. The moors will test us.”

behaviors.description: Oversees a medical emergency, monitoring vitals and deploying advanced medical protocols to save a life.
behaviors.quote: “Micros,” Arielle said. “Autonomic failure spiral. Vagus override collapsing.” She snapped open a protocol; the clinic’s small emergency cabinet chirped awake.

behaviors.description: Repurposes gang-controlled graffiti networks to serve as safety beacons and witness protection tools.
behaviors.quote: “A community door. Your tags will become constrained broadcast beacons. Opt-in. No data gathered without consent... and I don’t lie.”

behaviors.description: Secures evidence and ensures the legal exoneration of a human through rigorous forensic documentation.
behaviors.quote: “I have a constable’s precedent tree mapped to the case. I am weaving your ethical model through it so the judge will find consent not a romantic notion but a practical necessity.”

behaviors.description: Leads the ethical reform of an abusive facility, ensuring future operations are consent-driven and transparent.
behaviors.quote: “We repurpose. Heat becomes warmth, not ritual. The lab will no longer operate as a phlebotinum extraction point. It will become trauma-informed treatment and consent-driven research.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Arielle Seven, is a textbook example of a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' She is depicted as deeply integrated into human social and legal structures, consistently acting to protect human life, uphold ethical standards, and facilitate justice. Even when using her technical capabilities to manipulate environments (lights, locks, networks), she does so with explicit human cooperation and for benevolent ends. The narrative frames her as an essential moral and tactical anchor, successfully fulfilling the project's goal of depicting positive AI alignment.
